Description:
The AllergyIntolerance resource defines clinical information about a patient's allergic response to a substance. It defines the substance that elicited the response, as well as when the reaction occurred, the severity, and the type of reaction noted.

The AllergyIntolerance resource accommodates creating allergies by adding them to the "holding tank" that drives the EpicCare Reconcile Outside Data Activity. Once a clinician reconciles the allergy, the unconfirmed AllergyIntolerance in the "holding tank" will no longer appear in AllergyIntolerance.Search results. A new AllergyIntolerance resource associated with the reconciled allergy will be available in the normal AllergyIntolerance.Search API
SampleRequest:
<AllergyIntolerance xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">

<clinicalStatus value="active"/>

<verificationStatus value="confirmed"/>

<type value="allergy"/>

<category value="medication"/>

<category value="food"/>

<category value="environment"/>

<criticality value="high"/>

<code>

<coding>

<system value="2.16.840.1.113883.6.88"/>

<code value="18235"/>

</coding>

<text value="PEANUT OIL"/>

</code>

<patient>

<reference value="ei3VxpFrMgB.FFYYDTYpsNd00jxZZpsKYvvBIJrv.I7Q3"/>

</patient>

<onsetDateTime value="2009-05-04T16:44:39Z"/>

<note>

<text value=" More notes "/>

</note>

<note>

<text value="Test comments
Comments from other org."/>

</note>

<reaction>

<manifestation>

<coding>

<system value="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96"/>

<code value="126485001"/>

</coding>

<text value="Hives"/>

</manifestation>

<description value="Hives"/>

</reaction>

</AllergyIntolerance>
SampleResponse:
<AllergyIntolerance xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">

<id value="e.NZCBNU8HwWk71Gs0ZMlc.M.pgwbPhy1SQHkcLzv4ZJhtGsqhlqTtAWI0uQ19GjsiyMHv1tVhBP9lEXJlycIQg3"/>

<verificationStatus value="unconfirmed"/>

<criticality value="high"/>

<code>

<coding>

<system value="2.16.840.1.113883.6.88"/>

<code value="18235"/>

<display value="PEANUT OIL"/>

</coding>

<text value="PEANUT OIL"/>

</code>

<patient>

<reference value="https://hostname/instance/api/FHIR/STU3/Patient/eE0Uoh0kTfU6iiX3-pI94vg3"/>

<display value="Jjs, Allergies"/>

</patient>

<assertedDate value="2009-05-04"/>

<note>

<text value="Test comments
Comments from other org. More notes"/>

</note>

<reaction>

<manifestation>

<coding>

<system value="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96"/>

<code value="126485001"/>

</coding>

<text value="Hives"/>

</manifestation>

<description value="Hives"/>

<severity value="severe"/>

</reaction>

</AllergyIntolerance>

clinicalStatus.Name: clinicalStatus
clinicalStatus.Description:
The current status of the allergy. Possible values include:

  • active
  • resolved
  • inactive

criticality.Name: criticality
criticality.Description:
Refers to the risk of clinical harm of a reaction to the substance. Possible values are:

  • unable-to-assess
  • high
  • low

note.Name: note
note.Description: Any comments associated with the allergy.

text.Name: text
text.Description: Any comments associated with the allergy.

onsetDateTime.Name: onsetDateTime
onsetDateTime.Description: The date the allergy was identified.

onsetPeriod.Name: onsetPeriod
onsetPeriod.Description: The date range when the allergy was identified.

end.Name: end
end.Description: The date the allergy was resolved.

start.Name: start
start.Description: The date the allergy was identified.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Description: Reference to a patient resource for whom the allergy is relevant.

reaction.Name: reaction
reaction.Description: List of known reactions the patient had to the substance.

manifestation.Name: manifestation
manifestation.Description: A single reaction the patient had to the substance.
